title: Medical English Academic Writing and Literature Reading Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and General English Reading Comprehension
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment for current practitioners, emphasizing mobile learning via smartphones

learning_goals: Acquire the ability to structure medical papers and draft research manuscripts according to the IMRAD format
Analyze long-form structures of complex medical literature to derive core logical frameworks
Revise draft papers through peer feedback and enhance accuracy of academic expressions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
